verses.roman:
prāte prabhu-saṅge āilā jala-pātra lañā
prabhu-saṅge rahe gṛha-strī-putra chāḍiyā

synonyms: prāte—in the morning; prabhu-saṅge—with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āilā—came; jala-pātra lañā—carrying a waterpot; prabhu-saṅge rahe—remains with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; gṛha—home; strī—wife; putra—children; chāḍiyā—leaving aside.
translation: The next morning, Kṛṣṇadāsa went with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to Vṛndāvana and carried His waterpot. Kṛṣṇadāsa thus left his wife, home and children in order to remain with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
